rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area with Art Deco elements like geometric patterns and metallic finishes.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living space combining art deco style furniture, luxurious finishes, and ample natural light. Incorporates a dining area with decorative Art Deco fixtures.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace featuring modern ergonomic design while subtly integrating art deco accents such as geometric woodwork and streamlined furniture.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: A functional guest toilet with Art Deco-inspired fixtures that adheres to local building norms.

openings.description: A large, ornate entrance door with Art Deco detailing and a modern security system.
Floor-to-ceiling windows with geometric stained glass accents for natural light while maintaining privacy and energy efficiency.
A soundproof door ensuring a quiet work environment, featuring subtle Art Deco design elements.
Small windows with frosted glass designed in Art Deco style for privacy and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxury master bedroom integrating art deco accents, soft lighting, and elegant finishes. The room is designed to face a favorable direction according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: An attached bathroom featuring luxury fixtures with art deco detailing and moisture-resistant finishes.

openings.description: A well-designed staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor, ensuring smooth flow and adherence to building safety norms.
A door opening to a private balcony with railings designed in art deco style for aesthetic appeal and safety.
